fields.name: filter
fields.description: Filter flags (posFilt, mskPosFilt, timeFilt, dateFilt, gpsOnlyFilter, trackFilt)

fields.name: numSV
fields.description: Maximum number of SVs to report per TalkerId

fields.name: gnssToFilter
fields.description: Filters out satellites based on GNSS (bit 0: GPS, 1: SBAS, 2: Galileo, 4: QZSS, 5: GLONASS, 6: BeiDou)

fields.name: svNumbering
fields.description: Configures display of satellites with no NMEA-defined value

fields.name: bdsTalkerId
fields.description: Two characters for BeiDou Talker ID

issues: Uses Version 0x00 structure with different bit mapping for GNSS filter
Truncated fields: failed to extract svNumbering, mainTalkerId, gsvTalkerId, version, and bdsTalkerId (offsets 8-13), marking them as reserved instead

valid_variations.reason: Legacy Protocol Version 0x00 used for u-blox 8 / M8 series hardware. The bit offsets for GNSS filtering were shifted in later protocol versions (V1) to accommodate more systems.

adjudication.reasoning: The message UBX-CFG-NMEA exists in two primary versions. Version 0x01 (V1) is the modern standard for F9 and M9 modules, featuring additional talker ID overrides and a specific 2-byte BeiDou Talker ID field at byte 12. Version 0x00 (V0) is the legacy version for M8 modules, which lacks the BeiDou custom talker ID and uses a different bit-mapping for the gnssToFilter field (QZSS/GLONASS/BeiDou bits are 3/4/5 in V0 vs 4/5/6 in V1). Extraction 9 is an error because it correctly identifies the message as V1 but then fails to extract the specific fields from bytes 8-13, treating them as reserved.
